tweet: Back at work tomorrow after parental leave. It's gone sooo fast!
DSL was connected on Monday or so, got half a day of use before Telstra accidentally disconnected us from the exchange. All working again!
Moved into the new joint. Slowly unpacking. Mr X running wild for the last few days: way overexcited. Lucky we got the grandparents here!
Methinks it's not all going to fit in the truck this time...
Gearing up for the move tomorrow. Er, make that today! Just about ready for the removalists when they show up at midday.
